A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Last Jedi took risks that Force Awakens didn't. The easy choice would've been to have Rey be a Skywalker\, Kenobi\, or Solo\, and to leave Snoke and kill him in episode 9 like Return. Instead Rey is forging her own path\, and we will see the Darth Vader-esk character take the lead in the finale of the new trilogy. I truly don't understand why this many people are hating on this film.
